Gate Trog

6 HP, 1 Armor, 5 CHA, shock-baton (d6)

• Something living that was heavily altered by Machines and now a hulking mass of flesh and wires. Quite stupid.

• Has a singular goal to guard a door, archway or any other portal asking for a toll payment in anything but money.

• If bypassed without payment will follow in the distance, trying to hide and exact revenge in the most inconvenient moment.

category: monsters source: discord
